website_summaries.verdict: Small, sleek, and affordable, this lipstick-size charger is one of the smallest on the market.
pros: MultiProtect Safety System protects against damaging power surges and shorts
Provides an extra charge for all smartphones
Comes with USB cable and travel pouch
cons: This item provides the least amount of charge to smartphones

customer_reviews.title: Great little power bank!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased several of these as gifts for my office staff. Each of them are still in use, and each of those co-workers are still quite happy with them. The finish is nice on them, and the indicator led switches colors to let you know how much juice is left in the battery. Green is charged, yellow is semi-charged, and red is nearly or depleted. It also starts to flash red once it's about to be completely drained. It charges quickly, and it holds the charge for quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: Felix T. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this ahead of a recent trip and was glad I had it. I had debated between this one and one of the bigger ones but the smaller one worked fine and was easy to carry around in a coat pocket. Note that the charge speed is pretty fast up to about 75% then seems to slow from there, but served its intended role of getting me out of the red zone and back to high power quickly well. Worked as hoped and price was right. The carrying bag is nice to keep everything together. As noted, it is heavier than you might think given size; not a problem, but something to know so you aren't surprised.
customer_reviews.author: EWill

customer_reviews.title: Still thriving after 4 years
customer_reviews.text: Okay I bought this like 4+ years ago at this point. I lost the other color I bought (so sad), but the blue one is still with me. I've gotten several free charger packs through work/school/etc. They only ever charge my phone about 10-20%. The anker chargers literally take my phone from 20% to 90% (when I elect to take it off the charger because of laziness) without dying. AFTER 4 YEARS! Definitely get this. It's cheap and lasts so long. I'm sooooo impressed.
customer_reviews.author: bbbb

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected... But customer service spot on!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem to charge my phone completely. Good to use in a bind if my phone dies completely, but only brings it to a little more than half charged. Would prefer a full charge for sure! UPDATE:. Customer Service is something to be recognized! Anker contacted me and asked if they could send an update free of charge. Instead of the lipstick size that was not properly charging my phone they sent us this one! Love the lights on it to show the amount of charge left on the device. Extremely satisfied as it has charged my Google Pixel 2. Thank you to Anker!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Woodhams

customer_reviews.title: Great for that emergency back-up charger when needed.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my significant other. I got it for her as a Christmas present and she absolutely loves it. She gets about 2 and a half full charges for her Galaxy S7 Edge from 0 which is pretty good for something this portable. Durable, comes with a mesh bag as does almost all of their battery packs ship with. USB cable included, has 3 colors for charging indication. Ranges from Red, Yellow, Green. Simple, Sleek, straight forward and durable. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel V.

customer_reviews.title: Just right for small purse, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Anker battery packs are EXCELLENT. This one is the size of a longish chubby lipstick or lip gloss and fits in a small pocketbook. It charges my Galaxy S8 fast. It takes a while to re-charge the charger. I have four Anker chargers. The first was pretty big, and I also kept ordering smaller for portability. this was the one that I was really shooting for but didn't see before. Glad to have all of them Anker makes good products.
customer_reviews.author: nancyt

customer_reviews.title: Still a sure thing
customer_reviews.text: Just as good as the older model from a few years back - I use them as a tag-team, so that I always have one on stand-by: while the used-up one is charging, I pop the ready-to-go one in my purse. (The old model still holds up like a champ, btw) All bases covered! At least 1 full charge on my iPhone 6 everytime. Wish they came with lightening connectors, but all the same... Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kade

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: It does what it claims to do. Can charge an iPhone 6 fully in very short time, about 20-30 min, but I could use the phone while charging so it feels like only a few minutes. I noticed it needs to be recharged longer lately, takes hours so I usually leave it on overnight. I had it for months but only used it around 10 times. So I will keep an eye on this issue. Overall I like it so far. Other portable charger I bought worked great at first but declined overtime, within two years. I guess time will tell whether this is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: BZ

customer_reviews.title: Not very long lasting or powerful
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that I was excited to get this small compact charger as I had had a larger heavier one before and thought it would be great for traveling, but was sorely disappointed. It takes forever to be charged and to charge your phone plus it only will do it once before losing its juice. I would not recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Judy S. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great but does not work! Very disappointed with this charger. You have to push the button on top to turn it on and start the charge which turns itself off before a charge is obtained. Also the button has to be pushed to even charge the unit, while I guess works. But why is there a button anyway. Every other charger I've used worked without the button. Won't charge my Samsung Galaxy s6 or my fitbit one or my fitbit charge hr. Other chargers charged all of my devices with no problem. This was a total waste of money. I would have returned it but was too busy at the time and missed my return time period.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda M

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work at all
customer_reviews.text: I bought an Anker because my last portable charger worked and still works well. This one zero. We have been patient testing it, making sure we fully charged this battery, etc...... its dead doesn't work. Hopefully I can still return it. i don't have original packaging. :(
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised but make sure you get the cords that you need
customer_reviews.text: I took a star off because while this thing had a cord for charging it using a laptop (USB to mini-USB), it amazingly didn't come with a cord to connect it to the iPhone... to charge it. Maybe it was left out, maybe I didn't read the description. So you end up buying a cord(s) that are USB-to-Apple to charge your phone. Also, a wall charging cord would probably be faster but I don't know that for sure. That said, it works as advertised, mobile chargers are a lifesaver (especially in airports/on airplanes) and it's the size of a roll of quarters and weighs about the same. Easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Ian

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient charger!!
customer_reviews.text: I've often run into a situation where I'll be someplace and I realize to late I forgot to charge my phone and then POOF it's dead at the most inconvenient moment! This has really come in handy. It's small enough that it fits in my purse with out taking up a lot of room and gives me a charge until I get home. I don't honestly know how far this will charge my phone as I've never fully depleted it. I've charged my S7 half way and not killed it though. It's been a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: My ReeVu

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This little guys is a bit bigger than an actual chapstick, but probably about the size of a lipstick. It is great for giving a full charge to your phone to extend its battery life. The li-ion battery warrants a better life if you re-charge the device after using it for a full charge. Li-Ion batteries like to be stored at full charge, don't work like older batteries requiring full discharge. Li-Ions perform well when discharged to around 20-40% any lower and it can harm the battery. Feel free to ask me questions on battery practices if you have any! It has an 18 month warranty and the finish is extremely durable.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Rohr

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for a Portable Charger
customer_reviews.text: I have an aging Galaxy S5. It's on its second battery, as the first one started draining too quickly a few months back. The new battery will last me all day if I use the phone occasionally, but it won't live up to a heavy day's use. I purchased this battery/charger to make it less worrisome to use my phone when I'm out and about, and after the few times I've used this, I must say I'm impressed! It will be great for family vacations and other times when an outlet isn't readily available.
customer_reviews.author: Helius

customer_reviews.title: Nice product - very convenient.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is very handy - especially on long days and vacations trips. Pros: - I've used it for a Nexus 5 and iPhone 4S and it was able to charge both very quickly. - The battery itself recharges very quickly - Single cable can be for charging Anker or phone - super convenient. Cons: - You can't tell how much charge is left in the device. - It seems like all of these batteries have about 30% energy losses from transmitting the power across batteries so don't expect to get 3000mAh into your device - if you want something that can charge your phone multiple times you will need a larger battery.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: (Previous title: Great size, short life). AMENDED: Fantastic customer service!
customer_reviews.text: (Previous review: After minimal use, it simply stopped taking a charge, or giving a charge). AMENDING MY 1 STAR RATING: After seeing my one star review, Anker emailed me to apologize, and despite being six months past the warranty, they swiftly sent me a replacement for the defective charger. So far the first charge has held and it successfully powered my iPhone. Customer service is outstanding, so buy with the confidence that you will be taken care in the event of product issues.
customer_reviews.author: Aileen M.

customer_reviews.title: Small & Practical
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I have an Android work phone and Iphone personal phone. This is very easy to use and seems to last an amazingly long time. I bought two small charging adapters (sold seperately) so that I don't have cumbersome wires hanging when using. To give an idea of how long it lasts, I charged my iPhone from dead to 100% and then connected to my Android phone for another 35 minutes of a flight and it still hadn't been fully discharged. I can't judge the long term performance of the device since I've only had it a month but so far, I am very pleased with the size, appearance, carrying case and convenience.
customer_reviews.author: PharaohzenRob

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gives a decent charge but as a slow rate. But, does the job. Edit 5/17/16: Anker folks contacted me regarding the charger's slowness and were more than kind enough to send a charger that suited my needs. They advised instead to try out an Astro E1 due to the input specifications on my phone (SG5) and sent one over. Very helpful indeed and now I am sure I can leave home without worry of my phone (or usb-rechargable bike lights) going dead on me while I'm out and about. The Anker folks were very helpful and attentive to my needs and incredibly easy to work with. Great job!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia S Flores

customer_reviews.title: Very practical & compact
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I updated my iPhone 4 to iOS 7, my battery life has gone down dramatically (wish I'd never updated!). Even aside from day-to-day use, it's good to have one of these in case of a power outage, car breakdown, or other emergency, and it makes a good gift. It's compact, and light enough that I don't notice it in my purse. I have the blue one, which looks good and is easy to find in my purse. I use this at least a couple times a week when I'm away from my home or work charger. The only negative is that since I bought this, I've seen similar items cheaper on other sites (like 13 or 14 dollars).
customer_reviews.author: D. Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Ironman Spectator Survival
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as an Ironman race spectator, as I learned from past races that my cell phone cannot survive an Ironman! I charged the battery before the event. The battery (and charging cords) fit nicely in the little mesh pouch that's included. The battery gave my phone the extra life that it needed to outlast my Ironman. I was even able to share the battery with another spectator, whose phone was completely dead. The battery charged her phone to 18% before "running out of juice." I was wishing I had a few extra to sell at this event because I could have profited!
customer_reviews.author: Nursemomma

customer_reviews.title: Full charge for most smart phones
customer_reviews.text: This will charge your smartphone fully one time. Then you recharge it and it's ready for the next time. Even though it's listed as 3000 mAh, there is some energy lost in any transfer, so it might just transfer 2600, which is the size of many smartphone batteries. It won't do much for most tablets...you'll need one of their larger chargers like this:  I have both and use them when I'll be away from a charger for an extended time.
customer_reviews.author: Sean C

customer_reviews.title: Rock solid!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of this batteries as gifts and they all very awesome, the build quality is the best part of them, they're rock solid. The battery life is enough to charge any normal smartphone and theyre extremely portable, lipstick size.
customer_reviews.author: Oleg Litvin

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little gadget. Easy to use, easy to carry everywhere. Not heavy. Charges both my IPad and I phone. It can charge the IPhone from zero to full. A plus for ladies, the colors are nice. I use it everyday. Need to read the instructions though. When you are charging your device you need to push the button for it to start working to charge your device. First time, I plugged it in and expected it to work. Then I figured out there is a little button which you may think is only a light. Once you figure it out, or those who actually read instructions, it is easy...
customer_reviews.author: frequent shopper

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver Charger!
customer_reviews.text: From the time I received this charger, I was amazed by the quality of built, design, and even packaging. All of it speaks highly of Anker as a company. A few days after I received it, I put it to the test. I was traveling by train, and had an unexpected 7 hour delay, and my cell phone's battery needs replacing, for it depletes within a few hours of constant use. Thankfully I had my Anker in my backpack and I was able to charge my cell twice, to a full charge, and about one half charge. The product already paid for itself, if you ask me, and now I cannot leave home without it!
customer_reviews.author: A. E. Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have in a pinch
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. One for me and one for my wife. I don't need it very often but there are times where I've had to grab my phone and go and I have this in my truck at all times and its charged waiting for me. It is so handy to be able to know that I will have my phone charged if I ever have to be somewhere for an extended amount of time when my battery is low. You plug it in, charge it and bring it around with you. I even got a little hard plastic keychain usb to lightning stick that I can use for charging on the go, comes in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle W

customer_reviews.title: ... bought the larger model of this product an absolutely love this charger
customer_reviews.text: I bought the larger model of this product an absolutely love this charger, I decided to buy a smaller one for my daughter and as promised, this is a very good charger. The problem is that it is has an external turn on button on the charger and it can be turned on by accident. I would return this product, but I really like the company and will just make the best of it; I hope they change the design in future models. Have a gentle day
customer_reviews.author: David J

customer_reviews.title: Quick charge!
customer_reviews.text: Use this all the time. Quick to charge. Holds its charge for a long time. A little bit big but I won’t loose it.
customer_reviews.author: Tam

customer_reviews.title: Durable and works wonders
customer_reviews.text: I use this charger on my phone every day at work and it's the best one I've used so far. The blue finish is great and has yet to chip or peel even after a few months of near daily use. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent compact charger.
customer_reviews.text: I normally get about 3 to 3.5 hours of active use off my iPhone 6+. This little widget roughly doubles that, and it fits in my pocket along with my keys. I also have a larger backup battery that I take on days I expect to be actively using both my iPhone and Android devices, without opportunities to charge off a wall or car, but for most days, this one is great. Does what I need it to do without overly encumbering me.
customer_reviews.author: Auros

customer_reviews.title: Gift for Husband - he loves it!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I purchased this after my husband as a back-up power source for his smartphone. He's used it several times when on extended trips and not near a handy outlet and really likes it. (think stuck in an airport where all the plugs are already occupied by other fliers, for instance). Especially handy to have during a power outage after storm. Small and portable. Our children received two under a different brand name and had good experiences. So far, so good. Would definitely order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Voracious Reader

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: It works, but I can't even get a full charge on my Iphone 6plus. Good for an emergency standby, I guess. UPDATE-after seeing my review, Anker contacted me directly and did tell me that the unit wasn't powerful enough and that I should've have gotten the next size up. Also they offered to send me that correct charger at no cost to me. I received the new charger a few days later at NO COST! Top notch customer service!
customer_reviews.author: LHNJ

customer_reviews.title: Zero battery life!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed. 1st, the battery life is basically non-existant. So, what's the point!!!! I bought it so we could go camping and not have to run our car and/or battery down. But no such luck. As far as durability, don't know because I haven't used it as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Molly McMurphy

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for older smartphones
customer_reviews.text: The battery life on my phone has been dropping off steadily the last couple months. Not a big deal when I'm around the house or at my desk, but when I went on a house-hunting trip armed only with my phone to find rentals the problem had become a huge pain in the rear. This Anker charger has been a lifesaver! It's small enough that I carry it in my purse at all times. Super simple to use, and seems to charge fast enough. Anyone who has battery life issues and has a purse should own one of these.
customer_reviews.author: J. Freyberg

customer_reviews.title: Happy I purchased this!
customer_reviews.text: A great purchase so far. This was the first charger I purchased and used. I charged the charger using my computer and following the directions that came with the charger. Then charged my Galaxy tablet. Everything charged perfectly, but of course this was the first time for both. I like the size, the color and the fact everything worked. I only gave it 4 stars because I have used it only once. I appreciated all the reviews and those that answered the questions I had. The only thing I didn't like was I did not receive a packing receipt, that lists the items purchased and prices which I would need to prove purchase.
customer_reviews.author: The Katz's  Meow

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome for active life!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two -- one of this lipstick-sized one, and one larger version. Honestly, I'm loving it (I use the small one, my wife uses the larger). I mountain bike and hike, geocache and camp. I also frequently show my work at art shows. Having to use a mobile app for customer purchases is a battery drain, and being without an outlet for charging was stressful. KNOWING that I had a backup battery gives great peace of mind. I won't miss a sale! Great support and (so far) a wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lockridge

customer_reviews.title: Good portable
customer_reviews.text: This is a good portable power supply for travel. I had a big clunker that I replaced for weight and size and this did the job. It held the Samsung S4 map open (under power) but it died prior to the destination in a mad airport scramble. I used "the force" to find the final leg but the lesson was this: smaller size does matter!.... However the charge rate is less so if you're down in the 20% capacity range, and have to power off an auxiliary, for more than an hour, get the "hawg" @14,000mAh or you're out of spunk.
customer_reviews.author: pat_kindle

customer_reviews.title: I bought two
customer_reviews.text: Great! I was worried about burnout but it isn’t a problem. It stops charging when full. It gives me a solid power fill with one charge. It’s fits easily in my purse and is attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Moore

customer_reviews.title: Very compact and stylish, as well as functional. ...
customer_reviews.text: Very compact and stylish, as well as functional. I have a similarly sized battery pack that also has a built in LED flashlight. I think Anker should consider adding a flashlight component. That would make this five stars for me.
customer_reviews.author: CBZ

customer_reviews.title: This is a great charger. It is very small but it does ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great charger. It is very small but it does charge a phone or tablet efficiently. It will charge a iphone 5s to 90+% in 30 minutes and still have enough charge to charge another phone device. THe second device will be a bit slower and maybe get to 80% depending on the device. The charger will hold a full charge for 3-7 days. It takes about 2 hours to charge up. If I need another charger, I will get this one becuase of cost, size and efficiency.
customer_reviews.author: Making it in the world

customer_reviews.title: Anker: The best in customer care
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this in 2013 I had problems with it. It kept shutting off when charging my smartphone. Occasionally it worked, so I let the matter drop. Finally, I got around to contacting Anker in August 2014 to let them know that it never worked very well. Anker immediately replied that they were sending me a replacement. That one works perfectly. This company has unheard-of customer service and satisfaction, thus the five stars. Since this sale, I've bought a laptop battery for my Macbook that is better than the original. I don't think there is any other Amazon seller that gives this kind of service and that I trust more.
customer_reviews.author: AZCharlie01

customer_reviews.title: Not what's advertised
customer_reviews.text: You can charge this device using the USB cable provided, but you cannot then charge your phone because the cable provided doesn't fit any iPhone. This was a misrepresented item.
customer_reviews.author: David Gaier

customer_reviews.title: Love that it comes with a carrying pouch
customer_reviews.text: It seemed to take an awfully long time to charge out of the box, but I like the size, as well as peace of mind it gives me to have extra juice with me at all time should the need arise. The fact that it came with a short mini-USB cable was a nice touch, but I especially like that it comes with a carrying pouch. I don't know if I missed that in the product description or what, but I was pleasantly surprised when I opened the very nice box to find it inside.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole L

customer_reviews.title: Great for on the go charging
customer_reviews.text: Great for on the go charging. Both my husband and I like this device because it doesn't take long to charge and it is very portable. The only thing I wish it had was a built in cord/connector so you didn't also have to remember to bring you cord with you. I will actually be purchasing again because my husband left this at his parents house and they liked it so much we told them to keep it :)
customer_reviews.author: Britny

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for myself and one for my fiance. When his came, it wouldn't hold a charge. No problem, it was quickly replaced. Mine worked like a charm! It does get pretty hot when charging, so be aware of that. I liked mine enough that I ordered one for my mom who is out of the house from the moment she wakes up until it is time to go to bed and she needs to have her cell phone on at all times. I'm glad I found this product!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This is a lifesaver! Love, love, love the little mesh bag that comes with it. So easy to slip into a purse. Great for charging my iphone. Recently took it on a trip to New York and everyone borrowed it throughout the day to charge their phones. I could use gps programs on my phone all day without worrying about my battery! I bought the Amazon brand short iphone 5 charger cable to keep in the mesh bag with the charger. Charged the charger every night via my iphone adapter plug and the charging cable that came with the unit. No need to use a computer (which is slower).
customer_reviews.author: Janice S. Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect to throw in a handbag for travel
customer_reviews.text: Great "emergency" charging device! Light (basically the weight of the one battery that's in it), relatively attractive, and nicely designed. I like that it has an illuminated button that shows when the charger is "on" -- it turns itself off when not in use to prevent battery drain and damage. I measured this as delivering just under 0.5A using an HTC One, which means it's charging pretty rapidly. As always, I also love that Anker has such fantastic service and support, in case I ever need it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott G

customer_reviews.title: Anker Astro Portable Charger is one of the better ideas to come along
customer_reviews.text: Anker Astro Portable Charger is one of the better ideas to come along. I carry it in my glove box in the car. Excellent for long trips or for just shopping in my area. I use one app for shopping that needs a lot of battery usage and the little charger is there to help me out. It will hold two full charges. Everyone should have this. The seller contacted me and just sent a thank you note for ordereing it. Cannot get any nicer than that.
customer_reviews.author: BettyJoyce

customer_reviews.title: Great product that has given me peace of mind.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter after her cell phone completely ran out of battery several times during high use. She has a summer job where she frequently needs to use her phone's GPS as well as make a huge amount of texts/calls. With her being far away from home, it's extremely important to me that she has a working phone. Now when her phone is almost out of battery, she just whips out her portable charger and she's all set. Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: LadyR

customer_reviews.title: Great little unit!
customer_reviews.text: This unit works great! It recharged my "dead" iPhone 5 in about 2 1/2 hours to 100%, then recharged it again from 67% to 100% in less than an hour. My only gripe is that it would be more convenient if it came with a way to use only one cord to charge the unit and charge my iPhone. Because of the connection, I have to carry two cords in the bag to actually use it and be able to recharge the unit, whereas my son, who has a Sony phone, can use just one cord for both tasks.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Overton

customer_reviews.title: Charges good, but dies rather fast.
customer_reviews.text: it seems to die pretty fast, If I charge my phone on it it goes from green to orange withing about 20 min and then eventually to red, and needs a recharge....I am not sure , maybe it is acceptable for a power bank this size. I guess I d say it gives me one full charge (iphone7) when my phone is nearly dead.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ali

customer_reviews.title: Works.
customer_reviews.text: Working well. Minus one star for not having an lightning adapter for the iPhone - only a micro usb for Android phones. Also the design is a bit strange because you charge it using it's micro-usb and then you charge your device from it using the big USB out. Both functions could probably be done with one plug. This would help reduce the number of cables you have to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Consumer

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is fantastic. It charges my phone or Kindle quickly and easily. And the small size is so convenient to keep with you. The only thing I wish it had was a way to tell how much charge is left on it. Charging my unit doesn't drain this little guy, but I have no way of knowing how much is left. I carry it with me and would rather not charge it after every use, if I don't have to. That is the only issue I have with this. But I do love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Hackney

customer_reviews.title: This little guy works great!!
customer_reviews.text: I had a different brand/type of charger saved to my wishlist, but saw that this one had better reviews on it, and came in blue, my favorite color! So, I went ahead and ordered it, hoping it would help with my phone not lasting all day. It charges my phone and ipad very quickly, and I usually charge it overnight with everything else, so I haven't noticed when/if the charge is low on it. But, overall it works great, and I haven't had any problems! Thanks, Anker :)
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Okay in a pinch - consider something stronger if you'll be in areas with unpredictable access to electricity
customer_reviews.text: This charger gives me just over one full charge for my Galaxy S5. I used it in Central America and it helped in a pinch, however if I had to purchase again I would get something stronger that can charge more times. I found myself in a few situations i.e. bus stations where all of the outlets were always taken, only one charge was not enough on a long travel day. Just depends on what you will be using it for.
customer_reviews.author: bonliv

customer_reviews.title: This was not amazing and it wasnt bad either
customer_reviews.text: This was not amazing and it wasnt bad either. Just a meh? It works very well but for only a short time. For my phone which is a galaxy light it charges about...50%? And my galaxy tablet 4.0 like 10% (but my tablet takes forreeeever to charge even with the actual charger). It charges up really quickly and its good but once i plug it into a device if i inplig it i cant turn it off and save the juice in the charger...it stay on till it runs out
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Yang

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy, but Nothing Good Lasts Forever.
customer_reviews.text: I had posted a review on this product before -- raving about how well it worked for my two friends who I had bought it for as gifts. Well, when one friend came to me months later and told me it had stopped working, I didn't want to believe him. But alas, after only 9 months, mine died too short of NYE. It's a shame considering the product worked so well -- I was the envy of all my friends with this mini gadget! Overall, it's still a good buy, but nothing good last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Product Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Buy for size, not multiple charges.
customer_reviews.text: Works well an does its job. I was led to believe you could get 2 full charges of an iPhone off 1 charge of the unit. That's why I picked this unit. Neither my wife or I get 2 full charges out of one use. We both have this device and iPhones. In fact we have 3 of these devices but only get 1.5 charges out before having to charge it. The size of the unit is what I was mostly after and it fits the bill. I would recommend this device, but figure it to only give you one full charge and a little bit more. The unit does get a bit "hot" while charging the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Spyder

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting battery
customer_reviews.text: This was my favorite portable charger! I took it everywhere and it definitely saved me when I went to concerts. Unfortunately, it was lost during the concert but it served it's purpose even if I dropped it. It was strong enough to last 3 years and I'm sure if I weren't lost, it would still be going longer!
customer_reviews.author: Latyese

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this charger as a gift for my daughter. She isn't always around a wall charger, and I want to make sure she has phone service when she is working late or leaving classes in the evenings. It charges with a usb cord and stores the energy so it can fully charge her Motorola phone once. Best of all it fits nicely in her purse where she can access it any time she needs it. I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great size and weight
customer_reviews.text: Great size and weight. Charges my iPhone 6 and I've recharged it with my instapark 10 solar charger with no issues. Just have to remember to press the little button on the end to start charging. I like the bright colors available which make it easier to find in the dark when I'm camping or backpacking.
customer_reviews.author: snake eyes

customer_reviews.title: Anker battery- blue and silver
customer_reviews.text: So I was hesitant when I read the reviews but I decided to buy it and try it out and it is great! I bought a blue and a silver one and they both work perfect. My husband uses his while at work cause he's usually out and about and I use mine while out shopping mostly for my electronic cigarettes. The battery is great it can charge my 3 e cig batteries and give my phone a 50% charge afterward. My only complaint is that it doesn't come in more colors!
customer_reviews.author: AllieSpain

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but my phone got really hot the only time ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks good but my phone got really hot the only time I used it. Would return it but has been sitting around for a while and don't know how to get a return authorization.
customer_reviews.author: lewis b jones

customer_reviews.title: Worked as advertised and looks great.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my wife. She loves it because its small and light. The phone gets a boost as advertised when needed. Remember this is only good for about 1 charge and it is only 1 amp so a tablet or new phone may charge slower. That is not a negative for this device but a trade off of small size and light weight for performance. I prefer a slightly larger battery with 2 amp out but those are heavier.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: So worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a cell phone for many years as you can imagine but this is my first portable charger. I am super happy with it! The fact that it is rechargeable itself is major. I have used this countless times already and my husband has attempted to steal it (so I got him his own). Works perfectly with my GS5 and charges quickly. Great product and you can't beat the price! Comes in a perfect box with a mesh carrying case - love!
customer_reviews.author: MMM3M

customer_reviews.title: Great thing to have
customer_reviews.text: I have used this many times to charge my phone and tablet. I like being able to have this when I need it. When I am at work we are unable to plug anything into the wall outlets or computer so I was never able to charge anything but with this it is awesome. I use it and bring it home and charge it and throw it in my purse and I have it with me if I need it. A must have for anyone.. Never have a dead battery again!
customer_reviews.author: RiddleL

customer_reviews.title: but we're happy enough that we can juice up our phones
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband, who loves it. The brand of portable charger we used previously only charged cell phones. This one appears to work on just about any USB-charged portable device. We haven't used it enough to noticed if one device or another drains more or less power, but we're happy enough that we can juice up our phones, ereaders, or MP3 players, whichever happens to need it at the time.
customer_reviews.author: Lycoplax

customer_reviews.title: ... out when it was fully charged as it seemed like several days went by and it still showed yellow ...
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to figure out when it was fully charged as it seemed like several days went by and it still showed yellow rather than green for fully charged. Disappointed that a cable to connect with either my iPhone or iPad wasn't included. It only includes the cable to charge the mini from the computer and not to transfer that charge to a device
customer_reviews.author: Kgg

customer_reviews.title: This portable charger is wonderful. I traveled to 10 new cities for job ...
customer_reviews.text: This portable charger is wonderful. I traveled to 10 new cities for job interviews and was constantly using my phone's GPS and several other apps in the process. This portable charger contains approximately 1.5 full charges for my iPhone 5 - a lifesaver when you are in a strange part of a strange city and need an Uber or directions to get to your hotel. Great value for the price and a necessity when away from outlets for a busy day.
customer_reviews.author: Texan

customer_reviews.title: Work's Great!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these 3200mAh chargers, and wished I had ordered 2 more. My older son stole 1 from me, and he told me at the end of the day that it charged his phone faster than his old charger. I like the design, and how the power button cannot be inadvertently turned off in my pocket. This is far better than ANY generic product, and better than any I've seen in store's, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lohss

customer_reviews.title: Great Backup Power Supply
customer_reviews.text: This little charger works wonderfully. It's a great source of power when you can't plug your device in. Works great for our cell phones and tablets. Works with a Kindle Paperwhite also, just have to try it a few times as it doesn't always start charging on the first try. Gives about two charges for the cell phones and one charge for a tablet. Very portable and small, not quite as small as a lipstick, but easy to carry in pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Compact Lipstick Size, Easy to Carry Around
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend’s birthday. Her old Samsung phone battery is always dying. She carried around a bulkier charger. This is the perfect lipstick size that is so easy to carry around!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Samsung galaxy S3 and the battery is constantly dying, this is the only thing that enables me to make it through a weekend day. Small and easy to carry in the purse. The comments earlier about make sure you click the tiny button to make it work once all is plugged in is key! I use it on my husband's iphone as well, I just ensure that I carry his cable around as the cables for this are for micro usb. Best purchase I've made in months!
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Small and portable but needs the right adapter
customer_reviews.text: I bought two. One for myself and one for my daughter as she heads off to college next year. We both have iPhones that die in the middle of an important conversation. It is compact and is the size of a lipstick so it fits nicely in my purse or pocket. I have yet to use it but I carry it as a back up power source. I deducted one star because the adapter it comes with has a standard USB connection which does not work with my iPhone4 even though the advertisement says it does. I purchased a compatible adapter separately that did to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: madmom

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: What a great value for the price. I've used it to charge my iPhone 5 at some critical moments. Recently I was stuck on a plane for 5 hours sitting on the tarmac...waiting. One by one, my fellow passengers' phone batteries died off. But not mine! In addition to charging my iPhone, it will also charge my ASUS T100TA win8 tablet computer. Not a full charge, but a enough to use it for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Seat4F

customer_reviews.title: small price, amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I use my phone (Samsung Galaxy S4) a lot throughout the day and was tired of having to carry around a wall charger and constantly having to find an outlet to charge my phone. I bought this battery backup and cannot express how many times it's saved me from having a completely drained battery while traveling, at work, out with friends for the evening, etc. It fits in my purse perfectly, does not take up any space at all, and weighs almost nothing. The battery comes with a great carrying case and cable to connect to my phone.This was probably one of the best purchases I could have made this year and worth every dollar!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a great portable charger. It's small, will fit in small purses, and charges quickly. I've had many different kinds of portable chargers that turned out to be bad, and this one has been my savior. I've had it for 2 years and it still works as good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service excellent! Once I placed my order
customer_reviews.text: Customer Service excellent! Once I placed my order, I received an email with contact information if I had any questions about my order. After I received it, there was a follow up email with contact information in case there were any problems with the product. I emailed back a quick thank you and someone emailed back a you're welcome. I've ordered a couple more - they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Wow. Pretty darn good
customer_reviews.text: This charges my phone incredibly fast and holds about 1 1/3 charges on a Nexus 5 (which has a decent battery life to begin with) with light use during the charge. Huge lifesaver for a person who plays games and wastes massive battery levels on public transit. Compact size makes it even better. It does tend to roll away, so I put a little piece of putty on it to stop that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So nice I bought it twice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the silver version of this product in October 2013 (review here:  and I loved it so much that I got another one for a friend as a Christmas present. It charges our Android devices quickly and is wonderful as an emergency back-up for those who use their phone a lot and needs charging during the day. You can also switch out the USB cords and use it on your iDevices.
customer_reviews.author: Duckie

customer_reviews.title: love the charger
customer_reviews.text: I like this product a lot. It is very reasonably priced and allows me to recharge my iphone several times. It is also extremely portable and I can have it in my pocketbook charging my phone anywhere. I gave it a 4 rather than a 5 because the flashlight is annoying. It seems to turn on easily when it bumps up against things in my bag. Also, charging the charger takes a long time. I highly recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: cpg

customer_reviews.title: Charges pretty quickly compared to some others
customer_reviews.text: This works very well. It is nice for when your phone is dying and you aren't near a power outlet or you don't have your charger. The only downside is that it does lose charge if you don't use it for a bit but that is like most things. I carry mine in my purse and just forget about it until the moment that my phone is dying and sometimes my phone will stay dead since this has run dead as well. But it is extremely handy if it is charged! It charges at a pretty good pace also.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: It works great! Actually charges my phone faster than the wall outlet. Down side - it gets really hot sometimes then it stops charging your phone or device. I've used it a couple times while I'm using my GPS and I gotta make sure I turn my phone's screen off to prevent the overheat as it's charging. I actually bought one for my mom since she has an old car and if she charges her smart phone on the old car, it'll drain the Hell out of the battery - Idk why, it's happened a couple times with me. I'm completely satisfied and VERY thankful I found this.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Not for IPhone?
customer_reviews.text: Question I thought this was for an IPhone. The cord doesn’t fit my phonee. I need to return but need a charger for iPhone XR. I like the size and color. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Cindy E

customer_reviews.title: very convenient and perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: Have an old iPhone 4S that works fine except for the battery that goes from 80% to 1% at any time for no apparent reason. I love this battery since it's small enough to carry it in a clutch with room for the phone, wallet, and keys. The pouch it comes in is very convenient since I can store the cable to connect my phone in there so no more out of battery drama :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, but some room for improvement
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to charge my iPhone, and it's wonderful what it needs to do, but there's room for improvement It's a beautiful, sturdy aluminum body. I feel like it won't be getting too many scratches or dents. It's compact, and feels nicely heavy. It takes about an hour and a half to fully charge it and gives my phone a good 2%-ish per minute. The only thing is that the USB port seems not to be the best well built. It definitely wobbles a bit and if I bump it around too much it has a tendency to disconnect from my phone. If there was a battery level indicator and more sturdy ports, I'd give this 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: A joy to use it & easy to carry in the ...
customer_reviews.text: My Anker PowerCore was replaced free of charge by Anker which I greatly appreciate. A joy to use it & easy to carry in the backpack since I don't drive. Peace of mind knowing I can recharge my cell tel.
customer_reviews.author: Tuquoise

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, bit larger than expected, long time to charge up
customer_reviews.text: It works pretty well. It's a bit larger than I imagined (still quite portable tho) and it does take a long time to charge up (more than the 3-4 hours they state, but not a lot more). I've used it on my phone and tablet with no issues. Of course the tablet has a higher power draw, so it doesn't fully charge it when in use, but does manage to keep you on the positive side of things.
customer_reviews.author: Vegas SteveTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This battery is wonderful! It has saved me numerous times! Just remember to charge it before leaving home. I get at least 1 1/2 charges for my iPhone 5 before having to recharge. Very small and lightweight. Comes with a nice carry case, so you can store this and your charging cord together in your purse/briefcase.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: I'm torn...
customer_reviews.text: I love Anker products and this charger is small; rugged and works. However, it charges iPhone somewhat slowly and since I bought for traveling it's frustrating to not have an easy way to determine how much charge is left and/or status of charging its own battery. I used twice on my trip through airports and then searched for an outlet to use traditional charger... Not bad yet not great ... Maybe this is standard for backup chargers yet I have an Anker Bluetooth keyboard and that thing rocks so it set my expectations high for this company's products
customer_reviews.author: drmisty

customer_reviews.title: Great little gadget
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I'm conscientious about keeping my devices charged, but if all the outlets in the airport waiting lounge are in use and I've got a long layover, I start to get nervous about the battery. With this, I won't worry any more. I charged it up really easily, and it's so small I'll keep it with me. I'll keep it in my purse, but it will easily fit in a briefcase or even a pocket.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Young

customer_reviews.title: best external power supply I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: best external power supply I have ever used. I use this power supply for my Go-pro cameras, my phone, and I have a second one that I use to charge my Bluetooth headset in my motorcycle helmet. great product!
customer_reviews.author: J. Strauss

customer_reviews.title: Works....I bought 3
customer_reviews.text: I have gotten another 100 percent charge for my phone out of a fully charged Anker, and a bit more. I like it, really needed it because my iphone5 drops from 100 percent to 50 percent awful quick, despite all the tricks I use to conserve battery, so its a necessity to have this thing. One knock, and I am being picky here....it's a bit on the heavy side when you have it in your pocket all day, but not ridiculously so, and not enough to deter you from grabbing one.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Fit it's use perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: This is a neat little trick with a reasonable price tag. I picked this unit because of the IQ charging, not ever knowing the best amperage at which to charge each device. The company is very attentive, sending a pre-arrival email reminding me how to work the charger, (push the indicator light button to start the charging). I would give this 5 stars if the charge went more quickly, but that is a small thing, and the charge is enough to keep using any device that I have used it to charge. Overall it is terrific.
customer_reviews.author: RachlnK

customer_reviews.title: Great product and the prefect gift.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great product. I bought this as a christmas gift for my brother. My brother travels all for a living and is always on the go at events while working. This product is great because he can keep his iPhone in his pocket while it is charging and does not have to leave his phone. He's called me several times to tell me what a great product this is. The prefect gift for the person who is hard to buy something for!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Farabaugh

customer_reviews.title: High quality product
customer_reviews.text: The Anker power products are great. There is definitely a notable difference in getting high-quality usb cords, car and wall chargers, and power packs. I have been burned by getting the lowest cost power stuff on Amazon. The Anker products, this one included, work very well and are still much cheaper than getting them in retail electronics stores.
customer_reviews.author: jmmreads

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Gift!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered five of these as Christmas gifts and the recipients (especially those 15 to 25 who live and die by their phones) LOVED them! From their reports, the charger fully charged their iphones on a single charge and they felt there was probably enough "juice" left for a second charge. Compact and convenient. Easy to keep in a purse, laptop bag, or glove compartment for those moments when your battery is drained unexpectedly. Can also see this being used while camping!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Ferrin

customer_reviews.title: Not a strong charge
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this charger takes forever to try and charge your phone. Very weak charge.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Vandalsem

customer_reviews.title: Simple To Use and Convenient To Carry
customer_reviews.text: A portable charger is a necessity these days. This one is so easy to prep and convenient to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Maree

customer_reviews.title: Small and powerful
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my iPhone. I especially like it because it is so small. I can put it in my front blue jeans pocket without adding bulk and can plug it into my phone no matter where I go or where I am. It charges quickly and I can use it while it is charging. It is invaluable in the evenings before I go home to recharge. Otherwise I would be running out of power.
customer_reviews.author: S. Freud

product_meta.title: Anker PowerCore+ Mini, 3350mAh Lipstick-Sized Portable Charger (Premium Aluminum Power Bank), One of The Most Compact External Batteries, Compatible with iPhone Xs/XR, Android Smartphones and More
product_meta.description:
Anker PowerCore+ mini
The often copied but never equalled lipstick-shaped portable charger is now better than ever.

From ANKER, America's Leading USB Charging Brand
• Faster and safer charging with our advanced technology
• 10 million+ happy users and counting

Same Size, More Power, Unmatched Reliability
The original lipstick tube design. Now upgraded with superior quality battery cells from Panasonic (Tesla's battery cell supplier) to ensure superior performance and safety.

PowerIQ
Intelligent high-speed charging for all your devices.

Convenient LED Indicator
Light lets you know how much juice is left.

MultiProtect Safety System
Surge protection, short circuit protection and more advanced safety features keep you and your devices safe.

World Famous Warranty
At Anker, we believe in our products. That's why we back them all with an 18-month warranty and provide friendly, easy-to-reach support.

For Optimal Use:
• Use the included cable, your original cable or a third-party certified one (such as MFi).
• Compatible with Apple and Android smartphones, tablets (including the Nexus 7) and other USB-charged devices except for the iPod nano, iPod Classic, HP TouchPad, LG G2, Asus tablets and some GPS and Bluetooth devices.
feature_bullets: The Anker Advantage: Join the 10 million+ powered by our leading technology.
Fast Charging Technology: PowerIQ detects your device to deliver its fastest possible charge speed up to 1 amp.
Ultra Compact: Our original lipstick-shaped aluminum design (3.7 × 0.9 × 0.9in, 3oz). Recharges in 3-4 hours with a 1 amp adapter (not included) and the included Micro USB cable.

Highest Capacity: Most powerful "mini" portable charger on the market. Adds over one charge (14 hours talktime) to an iPhone 6, almost one full charge to a Galaxy S6 or one full charge to most other phones.
What You Get: Anker PowerCore+ mini (3350mAh Premium Aluminum Portable Charger), Micro USB cable, travel pouch, welcome guide, our fan-favorite 18-month warranty and friendly customer service.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars2,484 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Department: The Anker Advantage: Join the 10 million+ powered by our leading technology.
